home.heroDescription: World-class IEC 62443 consulting for critical infrastructure. We architect security, guide digital transformation, and deliver board-level strategic advisory where compliance meets executive liability.

hero.title: SOC Command
hero.subtitle: Operationalize predictive intelligence. Transform your SOC from a reactive alert queue into a pre-cognitive defense engine.

telemetry.title: Telemetry Mirroring
telemetry.desc: Direct high-fidelity telemetry injection from your SIEM (Splunk, Sentinel, QRadar) into the E27 Prediction Engine for real-time risk mapping.

hunting.title: Automated Threat Hunting
hunting.desc: Hypothesis-driven hunt generation based on 293 APT-specific profiles. We tell your analysts exactly where to look before the beacon calls home.

detection.title: Detection Engineering
detection.desc: Continuous Sigma rule generation and false positive tuning. Validate detection logic against real-world adversary TTPs in real-time.

psychometrics.title: Psychometric Profiling
psychometrics.desc: Enrich standard indicators with adversary psychology. Understand NOT just 'what' IP hit you, but 'why', 'who', and 'what they will do next'.

blueAI.title: Blue Team AI
blueAI.desc: Enhances human experience with playbooks, chat, and conversational voice interactions. Works autonomously on-premise while escalating to AEON Core.

redLeader.title: Red Leader Validation
redLeader.desc: Continuous validation using Red Squadron Leaderâ€”scenario-based emulation across sophistication levels from opportunistic hackers to nation-state APTs.

zones.title: Zones & Conduits
zones.desc: Visualize IEC 62443 security zones with SL color-coding. Click components to drill into SBOM details.

sbom.title: SBOM Traceability

framework.title: Decision Framework
framework.desc: How AEON Core processes telemetry and determines critical actions in real-time.

now.title: NOW
bullets: Active exploitation detected in customer telemetry
EPSS > 10% AND asset in critical path
Red Team confirmed exploitability in Digital Twin

next.title: NEXT
bullets: Rising EPSS trend (1-10%) with attack path potential
Asset in threat model but no active exploitation
Refit opportunity aligns with maintenance window

never.title: NEVER
bullets: EPSS < 1% with no attack path in threat model
Theoretical CVE with no weapon in the wild
Business impact below risk appetite threshold

framework.note: Note: Human analysts provide final authorization for high-impact blocking actions in OT environments.
